title: Tainted Love (The Tainted Love Trilogy-
description: We are damaged goods, Whiskey and me.We are both tainted, our souls tarnished.My life is dark, but his past is an abyss of misery.Do you know those kids, their faces plastered on the back of a milk carton?He was one of them.But unlike most, he survived, albeit battered and broken.Then fate dropped him into my lap, and he fell in love with me.I want to love him back the way he deserves, but I, too, have my demons to battle.TRIGGER This book contains extremely sensitive subject matter in reference to abuse, child abduction, and alcoholism.READER DISCRETION ADVISED. 18+
author: R&C Christiansen
